title.narrative: ED2- QUALITY EDUCATION

description.narrative: By 2021, children will receive quality education, with qualified and motivated teachers, which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, children of pre-primary and primary age (girls and boys), and especially those living in the most disadvantaged areas, complete the relevant cycle for their age.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2021, children will receive quality education, with qualified and motivated teachers

description.narrative: Les crises sanitaire et électorale ont amené beaucoup d’élèves à rester hors de l’école. L’UNICEF a soutenu la qualité de l’enseignement à travers le renforcement de capacités des enseignants et des cadres du ministère de l’Education nationale, a assuré l’acquisition de matériels scolaires destinés à renforcer les acquis scolaires de 137 114 élèves et mis en place une approche convergente éducation-protection dans les écoles ciblées dans les huit Inspections académiques du pays. La situation dans le pays n’ayant souvent pas permis d’évaluer les élèves lors d’un contrôle continu,; un état des lieux objectif du niveau académique n’est pas disponible.;; | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:31/01/2022
